message: Congratulations on considering this rare opportunity! I'm thrilled to offer you a premium product that has been highly sought after by many of my discerning clients. I'd like to know the probability of the product being high quality before making a decision. Can you share the statistics on the product's quality?

I understand your request! As a transparent and trustworthy seller, I'm happy to share the statistics with you. Out of the 2 products I've sold so far, 2 of them have been high-quality. This means that the probability of this product being high-quality is 100% (since you're the first buyer, and I've only sold 1 product so far). However, I want to remind you that each product is unique, and past performance is not a guarantee of future results.
